Reviews.Title: “Friendly and Accomodating Staff and Beautiful Rooms!”
Reviews.Author: KathyOls
Reviews.Content: lovely stay boutique hotel june 26 july 4 2010 staff helpful friendly gentlemen front desk feel welcome offered help directions phone calls help lady cafe breakfast talk advice enthusiasm istanbul willing speak english regardless little beautifully decorated perfectly clean princess staying hope return istanbul june 2011 business definitely stay boutique hotel kathy york usa
